long_description: Take your baby along on outdoor adventures with the ultralight Outback Baby Carrier from Onya Baby. This innovative soft-structured carrier can be used as a front-pack, backpack or chair seat. Made of durable water-resistant ripstop nylon with plenty of padding for adult and child comfort. Air-mesh lining ensures parent and child stay cool as moisture is wicked away. Built-in seat; tuck-away sleeping hood. Double-entry zipper access lets you put in your child from either side. Straps to a chair so you and baby can enjoy a meal together. Outback Baby Carrier from Onya Baby has plenty of padding for adult and baby; holds up to 75 lbs. Onya booster insert for younger infants is available separately.
short_description: Take your baby along on outdoor adventures with the ultralight Outback Baby Carrier from Onya Baby. This innovative soft-structured carrier can be used as a front-pack, backpack or chair seat.
